Package com.instruction

Class EncounterManager

java.lang.Object
com.instruction.EncounterManager
public class EncounterManager extends Object
This Class holds Tank, DamageDealer, Healer, EnemyEntity classes and operates fight dynamics with various methods

  • Method Details

    • Menu

      public void Menu()
      Menu method prints menu options and gets the user's choice

    • printStats

      public void printStats()
      This method prints current health points of both parties and shows options of the encounter

    • registerTank

      public void registerTank()
      This method is used for enabling user to register a Tank object

    • registerDamageDealer

      public void registerDamageDealer()
      This method is used for enabling user to register a Damage Dealer object

    • registerHealer

      public void registerHealer()
      This method is used for enabling user to register a Healer object

    • spawnEnemy

      public void spawnEnemy()
      This method is used for enabling user to register a Enemy Entity object

    • enemyIsAlive

      public Boolean enemyIsAlive()
      This method is being used to check if Enemy Entity is alive or not
      Returns:
      If the health point of the enemy is less than or equal to 0 than this method will return false otherwise it will return true

    • playersAreAlive

      public Boolean playersAreAlive()
      This method is being used to check if all players are alive or not
      Returns:
      If all players' health points are less than or equal to 0 than this method will return false otherwise it will return true

    • groupWideAttack

      public void groupWideAttack()
      This method is being called when the user enters 'd' in the encounter menu. Enemy entity deals damage to all players simultaneously.

    • playerAttack

      public void playerAttack()
      User is asked to enter which champion will do the attack. If user chooses a dead player than will receive an error message that is asking to try again with another player. After a valid input, the enemy takes the damage depending on the player role

    • enemyAttack

      public void enemyAttack()
      User is asked to enter the target of Enemy Entity. If user chooses a dead player than will receive an error message that is asking to try again with another player. After a valid input, the enemy deals the damage depending on the player role

    • healPlayer

      public void healPlayer()
      User is asked to enter a player to heal. The chosen player will get healed by the amount of healer's (mind value + 10) HP
